title: Amai Choubatsu: Watashi wa Kanshu Senyou Pet
synopsis: Framed and sent to Kokuyoku Prison for embezzlement, Hina Saotome desperately wants to prove her innocence. However, just when she thought her situation couldn't get any worse, she realizes that she is the only woman in a prison populated by men. But she may have even more to fear from Aki Myoujin, a handsome and stern warden who is intent on punishing her for an unknown reason.
